mapper.insert: insert into Member(mid,mpassword, mname,menabled, mrole, mphonenum, mnickname) values(#{mid}, #{mpassword}, #{mname}, #{menabled}, #{mrole}, #{mphonenum}, #{mnickname})
insert into Awards(ano, acontent, mid) values(#{ano}, #{acontent},#{mid})
mapper.update: update member set mnickname = #{mnickname} where mid = #{mid}
update member set mpassword = #{mpassword} where mid = #{mid}
mapper.select: select cno, ctitle, cpersoncount, cdday, mname from classes, member where classes.mid=#{mid} and cdday < sysdate and classes.mid = member.mid order by cdday
select cno, ctitle, cpersoncount, cdday, member.mname from classes, member where classes.mid=#{mid} and cdday >= sysdate and classes.mid = member.mid order by cdday
select cno, ctitle, cpersoncount, cdday, mname from classes, member where cno in ( select cno from Participant where mid=#{mid} ) and cdday < sysdate and classes.mid = member.mid order by cdday
select cno, ctitle, cpersoncount, cdday, mname from classes, member where cno in ( select cno from Participant where mid=#{mid} ) and cdday >= sysdate and classes.mid = member.mid order by cdday
select qno, qtitle, qcontent, qdate, qreply, qna.cno, classes.ctitle from qna, classes where qna.mid=#{mid} and qna.cno = classes.cno order by qdate
mapper.update: update member set mimgtype = null, mimgdata = null, mimgoname = null where mid = #{mid}
update member set mrole = #{mrole} where mid = #{mid}
mapper.select: select rno, rtitle, rhitcount, rdate, mnickname from recipe, member where recipe.mid=#{mid} and recipe.mid = member.mid
